title: Instructional Design Strategies for Enhancing UX in Design Learning Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental design theory and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Exploring UX evaluation and improvement strategies for a design learning platform in a limited-technology environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Analyze and explain the five core UX elements (e.g., strategy, scope, structure, skeleton, surface) of a design learning platform
Present UI/UX design principles optimized for mobile environments as actionable solutions for real platforms
Validate user experience evaluation tools based on Garrett’s five-stage model with over 80% reliability

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
